00031 
00032 void Wizard::loadThemeIcons(QString themePath, int Scene){
00033     QPixmap pixmap;
00034 
00035     switch (Scene){
00036         case 0:
00037             // Prefix creation
00038             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/prefixc.png").arg(themePath))){
00039                 pixmap.load(":data/prefixc.png");
00040             }
00041 
00042             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00043 
00044 
00045             cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00046             cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00047             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00048             cmdGetWineDllPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00049 
00050             cmdGetPrefixPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00051             cmdGetMountPoint->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00052 
00053         break;
00054         case 1:
00055             // First startup
00056             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00057                 pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00058             }
00059 
00060             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00061 
00062             cmdGetWineBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00063             cmdGetWineServerBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00064             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00065             cmdGetWineDllPath->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00066 
00067             cmdGetTarBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00068             cmdGetMountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00069             cmdGetUmountBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00070             cmdGetSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00071             cmdGetGuiSudoBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00072             cmdGetNiceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00073             cmdGetReniceBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00074             cmdGetShBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00075 
00076             cmdGetConsoleBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00077             cmdGetWrestoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00078             cmdGetIcotoolBin->setIcon(loadIcon("data/folder.png", themePath));
00079 
00080                 #ifdef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00081                     cmdGetWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00082                     cmdGetIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00083                     txtWrestoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00084                     txtIcotoolBin->setEnabled(false);
00085                 #endif
00086 
00087         break;
00088         case 2:
00089             // Fake drive
00090             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00091                 pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00092             }
00093             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00094         break;
00095         case 3:
00096             // Fake drive
00097             if (!pixmap.load(tr("%1/data/firstc.png").arg(themePath))){
00098                 pixmap.load(":data/firstc.png");
00099             }
00100             lblPicture->setPixmap(pixmap);
00101         break;
00102     }
00103     return;
00104 }

00106 
00107 QIcon Wizard::loadIcon(QString iconName, QString themePath){
00108     // Function tryes to load icon image from theme dir
00109     // If it fails -> load default from rsource file
00110 
00111     QIcon icon;
00112 
00113     if ((!themePath.isEmpty()) and (themePath!="Default")){
00114         icon.addFile(tr("%1/%2").arg(themePath).arg(iconName));
00115         if (icon.isNull()){
00116             icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00117         }
00118     } else {
00119         icon.addFile(tr(":/%1").arg(iconName));
00120     }
00121 
00122     return icon;
00123 }

00127 Wizard::Wizard(int WizardType, QString var1, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00128 {
00129     /*
00130         Note: var1 is optional data, used for different scene actions ;)
00131     */
00132 
00133     setupUi(this);
00134 
00135     // Loading libq4wine-core.so
00136     libq4wine.setFileName("libq4wine-core");
00137 
00138     if (!libq4wine.load()){
00139         libq4wine.load();
00140     }
00141 
00142     // Getting corelib calss pointer
00143     CoreLibClassPointer = (CoreLibPrototype *) libq4wine.resolve("createCoreLib");
00144     CoreLib = (corelib *)CoreLibClassPointer(true);
00145 
00146     // Creating database classes
00147     db_prefix = new Prefix();
00148     db_icon = new Icon();
00149     db_dir = new Dir();
00150 
00151     widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00152 
00153     Scena=WizardType;
00154     Page=1;
00155     QString console_w;
00156 
00157     loadThemeIcons(CoreLib->getSetting("app", "theme", false).toString(), Scena);
00158 
00159 
00160     switch (Scena){
00161         case 0:
00162             TotalPage=5;
00163 
00164             setWindowTitle(tr("New prefix creation wizard"));
00165             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Prefix creation wizard</b>"));
00166             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00167 
00168             connect (cbCreafeFake, SIGNAL(stateChanged (int)), this, SLOT(changeBoxState(int)));
00169 
00170             cmdGetPrefixPath->installEventFilter(this);
00171             cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00172             cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00173             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00174             cmdGetWineDllPath->installEventFilter(this);
00175             cmdGetMountPoint->installEventFilter(this);
00176 
00177             combSourceDevice->addItems(CoreLib->getCdromDevices());
00178         break;
00179         case 1:
00180             TotalPage=7;
00181 
00182             setWindowTitle(tr("First startup wizard"));
00183             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>First startup wizard</b>"));
00184             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00185 
00186             cmdGetWineBin->installEventFilter(this);
00187             cmdGetWineServerBin->installEventFilter(this);
00188             cmdGetWineLoaderBin->installEventFilter(this);
00189             cmdGetWineDllPath->installEventFilter(this);
00190 
00191             cmdGetTarBin->installEventFilter(this);
00192             cmdGetMountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00193             cmdGetUmountBin->installEventFilter(this);
00194             cmdGetSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00195             cmdGetGuiSudoBin->installEventFilter(this);
00196             cmdGetNiceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00197             cmdGetReniceBin->installEventFilter(this);
00198             cmdGetShBin->installEventFilter(this);
00199 
00200             cmdGetConsoleBin->installEventFilter(this);
00201             cmdGetWrestoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00202             cmdGetIcotoolBin->installEventFilter(this);
00203 
00204             txtWineBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wine"));
00205             txtWineServerBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wineserver"));
00206             txtWineLoaderBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wine"));
00207 
00208             if (QDir("/usr/lib/wine").exists())
00209                 txtWineDllPath->setText("/usr/lib/wine");
00210 
00211             if (QDir("/local/usr/lib/wine").exists())
00212                 txtWineDllPath->setText("/local/usr/lib/wine");
00213 
00214             if (QDir("/usr/local/lib/wine").exists())
00215                 txtWineDllPath->setText("/usr/local/lib/wine");
00216 
00217             txtTarBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("tar"));
00218             txtMountBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("mount"));
00219             txtUmountBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("umount"));
00220             txtSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("sudo"));
00221 
00222             txtGuiSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("kdesu"));
00223             if (txtGuiSudoBin->text().isEmpty()){
00224                 txtGuiSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("gksu"));
00225             } else {
00226                 if (txtGuiSudoBin->text().isEmpty()){
00227                    txtGuiSudoBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("sudo"));
00228                 }
00229             }
00230 
00231             txtNiceBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("nice"));
00232             txtReniceBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("renice"));
00233             txtShBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("sh"));
00234 
00235             console_w = CoreLib->getWhichOut("konsole");
00236             if (!console_w.isEmpty()){
00237                 txtConsoleBin->setText(console_w);
00238                 txtConsoleArgs->setText("--noclose -e");
00239             } else {
00240                 console_w = CoreLib->getWhichOut("xterm");
00241                 if (!console_w.isEmpty()){
00242                     txtConsoleBin->setText(console_w);
00243                     txtConsoleArgs->setText("-e");
00244                 }
00245             }
00246 
00247             #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00248                 txtWrestoolBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("wrestool"));
00249                 txtIcotoolBin->setText(CoreLib->getWhichOut("icotool"));
00250             #endif
00251 
00252         break;
00253         case 2:
00254             TotalPage=6;
00255             this->var1=var1;
00256             setWindowTitle(tr("Fake drive creation wizard"));
00257             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Fake drive creation wizard</b>"));
00258             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00259             lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to fake drive creation wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful fake drive creation.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>"));
00260         break;
00261         case 3:
00262             TotalPage=6;
00263             this->var1=var1;
00264             setWindowTitle(tr("Fake drive update wizard"));
00265             lblCaption->setText(tr("<b>Fake drive update wizard</b>"));
00266             lblStep->setText(tr("<b>Step %1 of %2</b>").arg(Page).arg(TotalPage));
00267             lblWizardInfo->setText(Wizard::tr("<p>Welcome to fake drive update wizard.</p><p>This wizard helps you to make all necessary steps for successful fake drive creation.</p><p>Please, press the <b>Next</b> button to go to the next wizard's page. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>"));
00268             Scena=2;
00269         break;
00270     }
00271 
00272     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject ()));
00273     connect(cmdNext, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(nextWizardPage()));
00274     connect(cmdBack, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(previosWizardPage()));
00275 
00276     connect(comboProxyType, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(QString)), this, SLOT(comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString)));
00277 
00278     widgetCreatePrefix0->setVisible(FALSE);
00279     widgetCreatePrefix1->setVisible(FALSE);
00280     widgetCreatePrefix2->setVisible(FALSE);
00281 
00282     widgetCreateFakeDrive0->setVisible(FALSE);
00283     widgetCreateFakeDrive1->setVisible(FALSE);
00284     widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
00285     widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(FALSE);
00286 
00287     widgetFirstStartup0->setVisible(FALSE);
00288     widgetFirstStartup1->setVisible(FALSE);
00289     widgetFirstStartup2->setVisible(FALSE);
00290     widgetFirstStartup3->setVisible(FALSE);
00291 
00292     widgetInfo->setVisible(FALSE);
00293 
00294     updateScena();
00295 
00296     this->installEventFilter(this);
00297 
00298     return;
00299 }

00301 
00302 void Wizard::comboProxyType_indexChanged(QString text){
00303     if (text==tr("No Proxy")){
00304         txtProxyHost->setEnabled(FALSE);
00305         txtProxyPort->setEnabled(FALSE);
00306         txtProxyUser->setEnabled(FALSE);
00307         txtProxyPass->setEnabled(FALSE);
00308     } else {
00309         txtProxyHost->setEnabled(TRUE);
00310         txtProxyPort->setEnabled(TRUE);
00311         txtProxyUser->setEnabled(TRUE);
00312         txtProxyPass->setEnabled(TRUE);
00313     }
00314 
00315     return;
00316 }

00341 
00342 bool Wizard::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event){
00343     /*
00344         User select folder dialog function
00345     */
00346 
00347     if (this->widgetFrame->width()<=100)
00348        return FALSE;
00349 
00350 
00351     if (event->type() == QEvent::Resize){
00352 
00353        this->widgetInfo->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00354 
00355        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00356        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00357        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00358        this->widgetCreateFakeDrive3->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00359 
00360        this->widgetCreatePrefix0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00361        this->widgetCreatePrefix1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00362        this->widgetCreatePrefix2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00363 
00364        this->widgetFirstStartup0->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00365        this->widgetFirstStartup1->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00366        this->widgetFirstStartup2->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00367        this->widgetFirstStartup3->resize(this->widgetFrame->width(), this->widgetFrame->height());
00368 
00369        return TRUE;
00370     }
00371 
00372     if (obj->objectName()== "Wizard")
00373        return FALSE;
00374 
00375     if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonPress) {
00376 
00377         QString file;
00378 
00379         if (obj->objectName().right(3)=="Bin"){
00380             file = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, tr("Open File"), QDir::homePath(),   "All files (*)");
00381         } else {
00382             file = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Open Directory"), QDir::homePath(),   QFileDialog::DontResolveSymlinks);
00383         }
00384 
00385         if (!file.isEmpty()){
00386             QString a;
00387 
00388             a.append("txt");
00389             a.append(obj->objectName().right(obj->objectName().length()-6));
00390 
00391             QLineEdit *lineEdit = findChild<QLineEdit *>(a);
00392 
00393             if (lineEdit){
00394                 lineEdit->setText(file);
00395             } else {
00396                 qDebug("Error");
00397             }
00398 
00399             if (obj==cmdGetWineBin){
00400                 QString wrkDir;
00401                 QStringList list1 = file.split("/");
00402 
00403                 wrkDir = file.left(file.length() - list1.last().length());
00404                 txtWineServerBin->setText(tr("%1wineserver").arg(wrkDir));
00405                 txtWineLoaderBin->setText(tr("%1wine").arg(wrkDir));
00406             }
00407 
00408         }
00409     }
00410     return FALSE;
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00414 bool Wizard::checkEntry(QString fileName, QString info, bool isFile){
00415     /*
00416      *  This function check user entry
00417      */
00418 
00419     if (fileName.isEmpty()){
00420         switch (isFile){
00421             case FALSE:
00422                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 directory.").arg(info));
00423             break;
00424             case TRUE:
00425                 QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify %1 binary.").arg(info));
00426             break;
00427         }
00428         return FALSE;
00429     } else {
00430         if (!QFile::exists(fileName)){
00431             switch (isFile){
00432                 case FALSE:
00433                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 directory not exists.").arg(info));
00434                     break;
00435                 case TRUE:
00436                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specified %1 binary not exists.").arg(info));
00437                     break;
00438             }
00439             return FALSE;
00440         }
00441     }
00442 
00443     return TRUE;
00444 }
00445 
00446 
00447 void Wizard::nextWizardPage(){
00448     /*
00449         Function for processing next\finish button click events
00450     */
00451 
00452     switch(Scena){
00453         case 1:
00454             switch (Page){
00455                 case 3:
00456 
00457                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineBin->text(), "wine"))
00458                         return;
00459 
00460                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineServerBin->text(), "wine server"))
00461                         return;
00462 
00463                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineLoaderBin->text(), "wine loader"))
00464                         return;
00465 
00466                     if (!checkEntry(txtWineDllPath->text(), "wine library", FALSE))
00467                         return;
00468 
00469                 break;
00470                 case 4:
00471 
00472                     if (!checkEntry(txtTarBin->text(), "tar"))
00473                         return;
00474 
00475                     if (!checkEntry(txtMountBin->text(), "mount"))
00476                         return;
00477 
00478                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "umount"))
00479                         return;
00480 
00481                     if (!checkEntry(txtSudoBin->text(), "sudo"))
00482                         return;
00483 
00484                     if (!checkEntry(txtGuiSudoBin->text(), "GUI sudo"))
00485                         return;
00486 
00487                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "nice"))
00488                         return;
00489 
00490                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "renice"))
00491                         return;
00492 
00493                     if (!checkEntry(txtUmountBin->text(), "sh"))
00494                         return;
00495 
00496                 break;
00497                 case 5:
00498 
00499                     if (!checkEntry(txtConsoleBin->text(), "console"))
00500                         return;
00501 
00502                     #ifndef WITHOUT_ICOTOOLS
00503                     if (!checkEntry(txtWrestoolBin->text(), "wrestool"))
00504                         return;
00505 
00506                      if (!checkEntry(txtIcotoolBin->text(), "icotool"))
00507                         return;
00508                     #endif
00509 
00510                 break;
00511                 case 6:
00512                     if (comboProxyType->currentText()!=tr("No Proxy")){
00513                         if (txtProxyHost->text().isEmpty()){
00514                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy host."));
00515                             return;
00516                         }
00517                         if (txtProxyPort->text().isEmpty()){
00518                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify proxy port."));
00519                             return;
00520                         }
00521                     }
00522                 break;
00523                 case 7:
00524 
00525                     QSettings settings(APP_SHORT_NAME, "default");
00526 
00527                     settings.beginGroup("wine");
00528                     settings.setValue("WineBin", txtWineBin->text());
00529                     settings.setValue("ServerBin", txtWineServerBin->text());
00530                     settings.setValue("LoaderBin", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00531                     settings.setValue("WineLibs", txtWineDllPath->text());
00532                     settings.endGroup();
00533 
00534                     settings.beginGroup("system");
00535                     settings.setValue("tar", txtTarBin->text());
00536                     settings.setValue("mount", txtMountBin->text());
00537                     settings.setValue("umount", txtUmountBin->text());
00538                     settings.setValue("sudo", txtSudoBin->text());
00539                     settings.setValue("gui_sudo", txtGuiSudoBin->text());
00540                     settings.setValue("nice", txtNiceBin->text());
00541                     settings.setValue("renice", txtReniceBin->text());
00542                     settings.setValue("sh", txtShBin->text());
00543                     settings.endGroup();
00544                     settings.beginGroup("console");
00545                     settings.setValue("bin", txtConsoleBin->text());
00546                     settings.setValue("args", txtConsoleArgs->text());
00547                     settings.endGroup();
00548                     settings.beginGroup("icotool");
00549                     settings.setValue("wrestool", txtWrestoolBin->text());
00550                     settings.setValue("icotool", txtIcotoolBin->text());
00551                     settings.endGroup();
00552                     settings.beginGroup("network");
00553                     settings.setValue("host", txtProxyHost->text());
00554                     settings.setValue("post", txtProxyPort->text());
00555                     settings.setValue("user", txtProxyUser->text());
00556                     settings.setValue("pass", txtProxyPass->text());
00557                     if (comboProxyType->currentText()==tr("No Proxy")){
00558                         settings.setValue("type", 0);
00559                     } else {
00560                         if (comboProxyType->currentText()=="HTTP"){
00561                             settings.setValue("type", 1);
00562                         } else {
00563                             settings.setValue("type", 2);
00564                         }
00565                     }
00566 
00567                     settings.endGroup();
00568 
00569                     accept();
00570                 break;
00571             }
00572         break;
00573         case 0:
00574             switch (Page){
00575                 case 2:
00576                     if (txtPrefixName->text().isEmpty()){
00577                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Enter prefix name first."));
00578                         return;
00579                     } else {
00580                         if (db_prefix->isExistsByName(txtPrefixName->text())){
00581                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry. There is other prefix with same name."));
00582                             return;
00583                         }
00584                     }
00585                     if (!txtPrefixPath->text().isEmpty()){
00586                         if (!QDir(txtPrefixPath->text()).exists()){
00587                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, prefix path is wrong! Directory not exists."));
00588                             return;
00589                         }
00590                     } else {
00591                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Select prefix directory first."));
00592                         return;
00593                     }
00594                 break;
00595                 case 4:
00596                     if ((txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()) and (combSourceDevice->currentText()!=tr("<none>"))){
00597                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify mount point directory."));
00598                         return;
00599                     }
00600                     if ((!txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()) and (combSourceDevice->currentText()==tr("<none>"))){
00601                         QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, specify source device."));
00602                         return;
00603                     }
00604                 break;
00605                 case 5:
00606 
00607                     QSqlQuery query;
00608                     query.prepare("INSERT INTO prefix(id, name, path, wine_exec, wine_server, wine_loader, wine_dllpath, cdrom_mount, cdrom_drive) VALUES(NULL, :name, :path, :wine_exec, :wine_server, :wine_loader, :wine_dllpath, :cdrom_mount, :cdrom_drive);");
00609                     query.bindValue(":name", txtPrefixName->text());
00610                     query.bindValue(":path", txtPrefixPath->text());
00611 
00612                     query.bindValue(":wine_exec", txtWineBin->text());
00613                     query.bindValue(":wine_server", txtWineServerBin->text());
00614                     query.bindValue(":wine_loader", txtWineLoaderBin->text());
00615                     query.bindValue(":wine_dllpath", txtWineDllPath->text());
00616                     if (!txtMountPoint->text().isEmpty()){
00617                         if (txtMountPoint->text().endsWith ("/"))
00618                             txtMountPoint->setText(txtMountPoint->text().mid(0, txtMountPoint->text().length()-1));
00619 
00620                         query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", txtMountPoint->text());
00621 
00622                         if (combSourceDevice->currentText()!=tr("<none>")){
00623                             query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", combSourceDevice->currentText());
00624                         } else {
00625                             query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", QVariant(QVariant::String));
00626                         }
00627 
00628                     } else {
00629                         query.bindValue(":cdrom_mount", "");
00630                         query.bindValue(":cdrom_drive", "");
00631                     }
00632 
00633                     if (!db_prefix->updateQuery(&query)){
00634                         reject();
00635                         return;
00636                     }
00637 
00638                     if (cbCreafeFake->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00639                         Wizard *createFakeDriveWizard = new Wizard(2, txtPrefixName->text());
00640                         createFakeDriveWizard->exec();
00641                     }
00642 
00643                 accept() ;
00644                 break;
00645             }
00646         break;
00647         case 2:
00648             switch (Page){
00649                 case 6:
00650 
00651                     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::BusyCursor );
00652 
00653                     //Set variables
00654                     QSqlQuery query;
00655                     QString prefix_name = var1;
00656                     QString prefix_id;
00657

00659                     QString version;
00660                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows XP")
00661                             version = "winxp";
00662                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2008")
00663                             version = "win2008";
00664                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows Vista")
00665                             version = "vista";
00666                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2003")
00667                             version = "win2003";
00668                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2000")
00669                             version = "win2k";
00670                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows ME")
00671                             version = "winme";
00672                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 98")
00673                             version = "win98";
00674                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 95")
00675                             version = "win95";
00676                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows NT 4.0")
00677                             version = "nt40";
00678                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows NT 3.0")
00679                             version = "nt351";
00680                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 3.1")
00681                             version = "win31";
00682                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 3.0")
00683                             version = "win30";
00684                     if (comboFakeVersion->currentText()=="Windows 2.0")
00685                             version = "win20";
00686 
00687                     WineBinLauncher *launcher;
00688 
00689                     launcher = new WineBinLauncher(prefix_name);
00690 
00691                     launcher->appendWineExe("prefixcreate");
00692                     launcher->run_exec(this, "", "-w", TRUE);
00693                         if (launcher->exec()!=QDialog::Accepted){
00694                             QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00695 
00696                             qDebug()<<"Error while run WineExe: ";
00697                             reject();
00698                             return;
00699                         }
00700 
00701                     Registry registry;
00702 
00703                     if (registry.init()){
00704                         registry.append(tr("[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion]\n\"RegisteredOrganization\"=\"%1\"\n\"RegisteredOwner\"=\"%2\"\n\n[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\Wine]\n\"Version\"=\"%3\"").arg(txtOrganization->text()).arg(txtOwner->text()).arg(version));
00705 
00706                         if (!txtFakeBrowsers->text().isEmpty())
00707                             registry.append(tr("\n\n[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\Wine\\WineBrowser]\n\"Browsers\"=\"%1\"").arg(txtFakeBrowsers->text()));
00708 
00709                         if (!txtFakeMailers->text().isEmpty())
00710                             registry.append(tr("\n\n[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\Wine\\WineBrowser]\n\"Mailers\"=\"%1\"").arg(txtFakeMailers->text()));
00711

00809                             if (!db_dir->isExistsByName(prefix_name, "system")){

00813                                 db_icon->addIcon("", "winecfg", "winecfg", "Configure the general settings for Wine", prefix_name, "system", "winecfg");
00814                                 db_icon->addIcon("--backend=user cmd", "wineconsole", "wineconsole", "Wineconsole is similar to wine command wcmd", prefix_name, "system", "console");
00815                                 db_icon->addIcon("", "uninstaller", "uninstaller", "Uninstall Windows programs under Wine properly", prefix_name, "system", "uninstaller");
00816                                 db_icon->addIcon("", "regedit", "regedit", "Wine registry editor", prefix_name, "system", "regedit");
00817                                 db_icon->addIcon("", "explorer", "explorer", "Browse the files in the virtual Wine drive", prefix_name, "system", "explorer");
00818                                 db_icon->addIcon("", "eject", "eject", "Wine CD eject tool", prefix_name, "system", "eject");
00819                                 db_icon->addIcon("", "wordpad", "wordpad", "Wine wordpad text editor", prefix_name, "system", "wordpad");
00820                             }
00821 
00822                             if (!db_dir->isExistsByName(prefix_name, "autostart"))
00823                                 db_dir->addDir(prefix_name, "autostart");
00824 
00825                             QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00826                             accept() ;
00827                         } else {
00828                             QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
00829                             reject();
00830                         }
00831                     }
00832                 break;
00833             }
00834         break;
00835     }
00836 
00837 
00838     Page++;
00839 
00840     updateScena();
00841 
00842     return;
00843 }

01056                         QString info;
01057 
01058                         info = tr("<p>All ready for fake drive creation. </p><p>Please, press the <b>Finish</b> button to create facke drive. Or press <b>Back</b> button for return.</p>");
01059 
01060                         lblWizardInfo->setText(info);
01061                         widgetInfo->setVisible(TRUE);
01062                         widgetCreateFakeDrive2->setVisible(FALSE);
01063                         widgetCreateFakeDrive3->setVisible(FALSE);
01064                         cmdNext->setText(tr("Finish"));
01065                     break;
01066                 }
01067             break;
01068         }
01069 
01070     return;
01071 }
